replies.body: you do realize that it is not the same cat. Right?
yeah I knew I was just making a joke
why is {{champion:107}}  standing on his keyboard?
My cat enjoys lying over my keyboard arm when I play...and she's not a small cat....

REALLY RIOT??????? idiots like this is what ruins games. If you wanna play with your cats go play with your cats. If you wanna play LOL then play LOL. Nothing worse than trying to have a game and someone is afking or not even really paying attention. Gets loyal players frustrated and makes them feel like they are just wasting there time playing. I know a fair few ppl who don't play anymore because of tools like this! Please don't be encouraging this sort of behaviour as it ruins the gaming experience for gamers who actually want to game, Thanks

Alright Mr Negative Nancy, it's a game, people are here to have fun, if you're not having fun don't play it, don't deny others the chance to have fun......What about things like Ultimate Bravery? I suppose you want those kind of things to be banned too.... Yes hello Riot please ban all players from having pets they are a negative influence on the health of the game.
Not just that, there is a reason he is playing ARAM so  he dont get people like this guy flaming{{summoner:14}}

Nah m8 you gotta take your ARAMs seriously. ARAMs are more competitive than ranked, you're not allowed to slip up this is srs business right here. 

Srs those kittens are so goddamn cute I wanna die. If you put me in a room full of kittens I'd be gone. Screw league I'm gonna be petting and cooing in baby voices in seconds. Who needs league when you have kittens.
i let my cat play when i pick {{champion:37}}
Never seen someone be so hyped over being 3/14/13

i know the feeling, i have 3 kittens that won't get off the keyboard and screen, and they just dont stay moved after I move them

and if you move your hand too fast when typing or using the mouse they think its a game and try pin it down with their claws
next time someone feeds my ranked game can I report them for playing with kittens on their keyboard and shoulders?
a fun channel that this guy gets views and gets payed good on him for a good idea thats paying for his skins and internet  well done  :D
